name: Dodge Your Bullets
description:
Dodge Your Bullets is a simple game where you try to hit all the targets that appears while trying to dodge your own bullets.

  • The more bullets you have on the screen, the more points you get.
  • The aim is to score as much as you can. Enjoy <3

I would love to hear your opinions about the game.

Used Assets

  • Sound Effects: https://gamesupply.itch.io/300-futuristic-sfx-with-names
  • Menu Music: https://soundcloud.com/steviasphere
    Menu Music License: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
  • Game Music: https://retroindiejosh.itch.io/free-music-pack-5
